name: Chicken Burger
description: A hamburger is a food, typically considered a sandwich, consisting of one or more cooked patties—usually ground meat, typically beef—placed inside a sliced bread roll or bun.

name: Mashroom Burger
description: In a mixing bowl mix mozzarella cheese with chopped bell pepers, green cilli ( optional), mix herbs, Italian seasoning, and pepper and make the stuffing.

name: Cheese Pizza
description: Pizza is a dish of Italian origin consisting of a usually round, flattened base of leavened wheat-based dough topped with tomatoes, cheese, and often various other ingredients.

name: Greek Pizza
description: Pizza is a dish of Italian origin consisting of a usually round, flattened base of leavened wheat-based dough topped with tomatoes, cheese, and often various other ingredients.

name: Chicken Biriyani
description: Biryani is a mixed rice dish originating among the Muslims of the Indian subcontinent. It is made with Indian spices, rice, and meat usually that of chicken, goat, lamb, prawn.

name: Beef Biriyani
description: In Hyderabad, it is famous as Kalyani biryani, in which buffalo or cow meat is used. This meal was started after the Kalyani Nawabs of Bidar came to Hyderabad sometime.
